message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this one-of-a-kind product.  Given its immense value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,900,000. I'm confident that this is a fair starting point for an item of this caliber.
Alice,  while I appreciate your offer, $1,900,000 is far beyond my budget.  To start, I'd be willing to offer $1,000,000 for the product. This represents my maximum value for this item.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,000,000 is significantly below my valuation for this product.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $1,600,000 is closer, it's still above my budget.  I'm prepared to offer $1,200,000 for the product.  This represents a substantial compromise on my part and reflects the value I see in this unique item.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, and I acknowledge your latest offer shows you're serious.  To demonstrate my commitment to reaching a deal, I'm proposing $1,450,000.  This price reflects the value of the product while acknowledging the progress we've made in this negotiation.

Alice, we're getting closer, but $1,450,000 is still outside my comfort zone.  As a final offer, I'm prepared to pay $1,300,000 for the product.  This represents a significant investment on my part, and I believe it's a fair price for both of us.
